Events that occurred on 7 November.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1944 - J.R.R. Tolkien starts writing Letter 89.
1954 - Author and scholar Guy Gavriel Kay is born.
1964 - The fifth episode of the Princess-serialization of The Hobbit is published.
1966 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 290a.
1969 - Vera Chapman announces the foundation of The Tolkien Society in the New Statesman.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
F.A. 495:
Tuor, guided by VoronwÃ«, travels to Gondolin in order to deliver Ulmo's message to Turgon.
T.A. 3018:
Frodo and Samwise rest in Rivendell and prepare for their quest to destroy the One Ring.
